    • Method Detail

      • getMetadata

        public Level.Metadata getMetadata(Level level)
        Gets the metadata associated with a level.
        Parameters:
        level - The level to get metadata for.
        Returns:
        The metadata for the requested level, or the default metadata if there wasn't an entry for the level. (default metadata is locked and has 0 stars earned).

      • updateStats

        public void updateStats()
        Called to notify that some game state may have changed, so achievements, etc. can be checked and updated.

      • undoLastMove

        public boolean undoLastMove()
        Undoes the most recently made move, if possible
        Returns:
        true if undo was successful, false otherwise

      • redoLastMove

        public boolean redoLastMove()
        Redoes the most recently undone move, if possible
        Returns:
        true if redo was successful, false otherwise
